title: Disney Plus Schedule October 14-20 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added
description: Disney Plus’ schedule of new TV and movie releases for October 14-20 2024, includes a new episode of Agatha All Along and Me & Mickey Season 3, along with two episodes of Playdate with Winnie the Pooh Season 2. On October 16, Disney Plus viewers can check out the sixth episode of Agatha All Along. […] The post Disney Plus Schedule October 14-20 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ritika Singh
excerpt: Fans curious about Disney Plus' schedule for October 14-20 2024 can find all the details here. Check out the list.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Disney Plus’ schedule of new TV and movie releases for October 14-20 2024, includes a new episode of Agatha All Along and Me & Mickey Season 3, along with two episodes of Playdate with Winnie the Pooh Season 2. On October 16, Disney Plus viewers can check out the sixth episode of Agatha All Along. The sci-fi fantasy show revolves around Agatha Harkness, who is freed by a curse by Teen. However, Agatha is shocked to find out she has lost her powers. Further, Teen requests her to take him on the legendary Witches’ Road, where witches can get what they need if they survive the place. Further, an episode of Me & Mickey’s third season will be available on the platform on October 16. The short-animated series revolves around the iconic character, Mickey Mouse. He engages in numerous fun activities and discusses several topics to entertain his audience. However, the mouse’s real goal is to provide preschool lessons to toddlers like learning shapes and colors. Also, coming out on the platform on the same day is Playdate with Winnie the Pooh Season 2 (2 episodes). The animated series explores the adventures of the young and fun-loving Winnie The Pooh. He goes on numerous playdates in the Hundred-Acre Woods along with his friends. Aside from fun, Pooh also learns many important lessons about life and the importance of friendship. The week’s other releases include Pupstruction, LEGO Marvel Avengers: Mission Demolition, and The Devil’s Climb. New Disney Plus releases for October 14-20 2024 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from October 14-20 2024. October 15 Pupstruction (S2, 13 episodes) October 16 Kiff (Halloween special) Me & Mickey (Shorts) (S3, 1 episode) Me & Winnie the Pooh (S2, 1 episode) Playdate with Winnie the Pooh (Shorts) (S2, 2 episodes) Agatha All Along Episode 6 October 18 The Devil’s Climb Ayla & the Mirrors – New Episodes LEGO Marvel Avengers: Mission Demolition – Premiere October 19 2024 Rock & Roll Hall of Fame For more Disney Plus content, check out the streaming release date of Win or Lose. Also, find out Who Is The Real Villain of Agatha All Along?
html:
Disney Plus’ schedule of new TV and movie releases for October 14-20 2024, includes a new episode of Agatha All Along and Me & Mickey Season 3, along with two episodes of Playdate with Winnie the Pooh Season 2.

On October 16, Disney Plus viewers can check out the sixth episode of Agatha All Along. The sci-fi fantasy show revolves around Agatha Harkness, who is freed by a curse by Teen. However, Agatha is shocked to find out she has lost her powers. Further, Teen requests her to take him on the legendary Witches’ Road, where witches can get what they need if they survive the place.

Further, an episode of Me & Mickey’s third season will be available on the platform on October 16. The short-animated series revolves around the iconic character, Mickey Mouse. He engages in numerous fun activities and discusses several topics to entertain his audience. However, the mouse’s real goal is to provide preschool lessons to toddlers like learning shapes and colors.

Also, coming out on the platform on the same day is Playdate with Winnie the Pooh Season 2 (2 episodes). The animated series explores the adventures of the young and fun-loving Winnie The Pooh. He goes on numerous playdates in the Hundred-Acre Woods along with his friends. Aside from fun, Pooh also learns many important lessons about life and the importance of friendship.

The week’s other releases include Pupstruction, LEGO Marvel Avengers: Mission Demolition, and The Devil’s Climb.

New Disney Plus releases for October 14-20 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from October 14-20 2024.

October 15

  • Pupstruction (S2, 13 episodes)

October 16

  • Kiff (Halloween special)
  • Me & Mickey (Shorts) (S3, 1 episode)
  • Me & Winnie the Pooh (S2, 1 episode)
  • Playdate with Winnie the Pooh (Shorts) (S2, 2 episodes)
  • Agatha All Along Episode 6

October 18

  • The Devil’s Climb
  • Ayla & the Mirrors – New Episodes
  • LEGO Marvel Avengers: Mission Demolition – Premiere

October 19

  • 2024 Rock & Roll Hall of Fame

For more Disney Plus content, check out the streaming release date of Win or Lose. Also, find out Who Is The Real Villain of Agatha All Along?
